topic.title: What ZeroNet should be.
topic.body: Embed ZeroNet service inside custom Linux virtual machine, ZeroNet will store meta information like ip address, needed to connect unlimited linux virtual machines together, creating a huge network, where users can employ linux’s peer to peer applications like Pidgeon, and file transfer.

9_12i4LiZ39NxcYtsf36aTWJzcpzw4KFUCJy.body: The bottom line is that people from weird religions that say to either enslave or kill anyone who is not in it, infiltrated the governments and own the Central Banks around the world, thus giving them unlimited currency. This is especially so in the US and Germany. Now that the people have found out about this scheme to enslave them, they're fighting back.

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Embed ZeroNet service inside custom Linux virtual machine, ZeroNet will store meta information like ip address, needed to connect unlimited linux virtual machines together, creating a huge network, where users can employ linux’s peer to peer applications like Pidgeon, and file transfer.
